heif.boxes

Class ItemInformationBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.ItemInformationBox

  • public class ItemInformationBox
extends FullBox
    Represents the iinf (Item Information Box), which describes items within the HEIF file. This is often used to locate EXIF metadata, thumbnails, or other auxiliary images.

    Specification Reference: ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015, Pages 81â€“83.

    API Note: Additional testing is required to validate the reliability and robustness of this implementation.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ItemInformationBox.ItemInfoEntry
      Represents an infe (Item Info Entry) box inside an iinf box.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemInformationBox

        public ItemInformationBox(Box box,
                          SequentialByteReader reader)
        Parses the ItemInformationBox from the specified reader.
        Parameters:
        box - the parent box header
        reader - the sequential byte reader for HEIF content

    • Method Detail

      • getEntries

        public java.util.List<ItemInformationBox.ItemInfoEntry> getEntries()
        Returns the list of all ItemInformationBox.ItemInfoEntry entries in this box.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of ItemInfoEntry

      • containsExif

        public boolean containsExif()
        Checks whether this ItemInformationBox contains an EXIF metadata reference.
        Returns:
        boolean true if an EXIF reference exists, otherwise false

      • findExifItemID

        public int findExifItemID()
        Retrieves the Item ID associated with the EXIF metadata entry.
        Returns:
        the EXIF Item ID if present, otherwise -1

      • getEntry

        public java.util.Optional<ItemInformationBox.ItemInfoEntry> getEntry(int itemID)
        Retrieves the ItemInformationBox.ItemInfoEntry matching the given itemID.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the item ID to search for
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the matching entry if found, otherwise Optional.empty() is returned

      • getBoxList

        public java.util.List<Box> getBoxList()
        Returns a combined list of all boxes contained in this ItemInformationBox, including the ItemInfoEntry boxes (infe).
        Overrides:
        getBoxList in class Box
        Returns:
        a combined list of Box objects in reading order

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs a single diagnostic line for this box at the debug level.

        This is useful when traversing the box tree of a HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure for debugging or inspection purposes.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class FullBox
